posts.content:
http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/261663159004

Hi all please note that this is a scam so don't bid on it , and has been reported to the police, the reason i know it is a scam , is because it's my van and is on my drive.
I am the legal owner and purchased it about six weeks ago. The info is a cut and paste from the original advert. i feel sorry for the people bidding on it. And no i don't live in carmarthen.

its difficult to get ebay to do anything as their reporting sends you round in circles and doesn't address the issues.

Thanks Colin

Good on eBay , I managed to get it on there this afternoon. Hopefully stopped the rip off merchant.

Cheers Colin
